ygData.subject: Re: OT neverwinternights Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack! Go ahead and spoil it for me. I m too lazy and I can t find the book right now. I think it s buried under my notes and stuff on EQ... Just put some
ygData.messageBody:
Ack! Go ahead and spoil it for me. I'm too lazy and I can't find the book
right now. I think it's buried under my notes and stuff on EQ... Just put
some spoiler space in. :-)
luv,
-Su

>
> If you have the book, then you probably already know what happens to
Aribeth (unless you haven't read ahead, in which case, I won't spoil it)
You just have to play the game to see how it turns out.. it is kinda funny
in some ways... I have a 18bard/2 rogue, with really good CHA, &
Persuasion, so alot of things in the book were different.... I think alot
of the mistakes were from hurrying too much (which also caused ALOT of bugs
in the game) =(
> Let me know how your adventure goes =D
> Kat
> Su <suceress@...> wrote: Ok, so it's through the caves?
> I made some notes of some errors in the game-- such as the price you can
get
> your hirelings for. With good persuasion you can get them for 100gp.
> Hey, have you tried going into the Moonstone Mask and hiring a hooker?
That
> is pretty funny. There was only one male hooker though.
> So what happens to Fenthick?
> I think it'd be cooler if they had a broader range of npcs you could date
or
> such. I may make a male character just to see how the Aribeth angle turns
> out. heh. Thanks for the info!
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I went in through the caves... & then went outside to the courtyard,
&
> there was Fenthick... I noticed that the book was mistaken on a few
> things... probably due in part to bad planning & such, but overall, I
> think the book was a great help. I noticed the way the mods work,
there's
> an end mod to chapter 1 as there is one to chapter 2 also... It seems
like
> chapter 4 is just the end mod to chapter 3.. Although I'm not sure because
I
> haven't got through the whole thing yet. In chapter 2, if you are a male
> character, you can start up a romance with Aribeth, or if you are
female,
> you can start one up with Arrin Gend (Lord Nasher's head spy). It is
pretty
> interesting, & adds an element of well, it just adds an extra element to
> the game.
> > Kat
> > Su <suceress@...> wrote: I'm still in the first or second
one--
> the one where you go to Castle Helm.
> > The book I got said you're supposed to find Fenthick in an alcove in the
> > east-- but I haven't found him. Have you?
> > I wasn't clear if he was outside or inside bc the guidebook was kinda
> > crappy.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
> > >
> > > Neverwinter Nights is a cool game. In the single player I've gotten
to
> > the final chapter, but Haven't gotten all the way through it yet. I
> > haven't Played Warcraft 3 yet, but My Boyfriend just got it today &
he's
> > playing it as I type this.. Looks interesting... Unfortunately I do
not
> > have enough room on my hard drive for it =(
> > > Kat
> > > Su <suceress@...> wrote: I've never played Warcraft but I do
> > play Neverwinter Nights. Man, that's a
> > > fun game. :-)
> > > My mom, myself, my brother, and my sister all have seperate accounts.
> :-)
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
> > >
> > > LOL....well we started 3 years ago. I play,my wife plays and our kids
> have
> > > an account too. We have lots of fun at at. Of course now we are
> splitting
> > > time with Neverwinter Nights and Warcraft 3. But always go back to
> EQ...:>
> > >
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Toni
> > > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > > Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 10:17 PM
> > > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
> > >
> > >
> > > I have just one thing to say... YOU ROCK I hope I'm still playing
> > > everquest when I'm that age =D
> > >
> > > Toni
> > >
> > > Orion <orionv@...> wrote:
> > >
> > > I just turned 48 yesterday and my wife is 40.

ask
> > is
> > > I
> > > would be curious as to what some of the ages people are who
play.
> > > Since
> > > you mentioned your "retired" that really got me to wondering.
;-)
> > >
